Class MolecularFactory

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.ui.viewers.chemistry.MolecularFactory
public class MolecularFactory extends Object
Factory for creating molecular renderers using SPI-based backend discovery. Similar to
invalid reference 
org.jscience.ui.plotting.PlotFactory
.

      public static void setBackend(String backendId)
      Sets the preferred backend by ID.
      Parameters:
      backendId - Backend ID (e.g., "javafx", "jmol") or null for AUTO
